d1_flags: 1. goto C7C588 if UNDERWORLD_TALKING_ROCK_STOPPED_TALKING is set
1. goto C9E041 if TEMP_2 is set
1. goto C9E252 if GOT_ALL_MELODIES is set
d1_text:
Npc1292:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG UNDERWORLD_TALKING_ROCK_STOPPED_TALKING L_C7C588]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GOT_ALL_MELODIES L_C9E252]
[PLAY_MUSIC 119]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_2 L_C9E041]
ï¿½You finally came, [PRINT_STAT NESS_NAME].[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[SET_STATUS NESS PERSISTENT NONE]
[SET_STATUS NESS PERSISTENT_SPECIAL NONE]
[SET_STATUS NESS HOMESICKNESS NOT_HOMESICK]
[RECOVER_HP_PERCENT NESS 100]
[RESTORE_PP_PERCENT NESS 100]
[PLAY_SFX 37]
[PAUSE 10]ï¿½Finally, you talk to me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Listen [PRINT_STAT NESS_NAME].[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm going to tell you something very important.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You may want to take notes.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Ready?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You're the chosen one.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Your destiny is not only yours...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's the destiny of the whole universe.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There will be a time in which all of you in the universe will overlap each other.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...It's not necessary to understand now.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you remember ï¿½Giant Stepï¿½ in Onett?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½That is one of ï¿½Your Sanctuary.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It is a spot which gives you power[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½and allows you to realize all your skills.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There was a monster that protected it.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The monster was influenced by the power of the place.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You must have beaten those monsters.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You must reach all of the eight power spots in the world...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½When the Sound Stone records the melodies of all eight power spots,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you can finally see ï¿½Your World.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C9E041
L_C9E041:
ï¿½I'll tell you all of the power spots.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½1. ï¿½Giant Stepï¿½ in Onett.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½2. ï¿½Lilliput Stepsï¿½ in Peaceful Rest Valley near Twoson.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½3. ï¿½Milky Wellï¿½ in Grapefruit Falls in Saturn Valley.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½4. ï¿½Rainy Circleï¿½ found by [PRINT_NAME JEFF] in Winters.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½5. ï¿½Magnet Hillï¿½ at the edge of the city of Fourside.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½6. ï¿½Pink Cloudï¿½ which [PRINT_NAME POO] knows.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½7. and... ï¿½Lumine Holeï¿½ where the shining lichen lives in the cave.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½8. A new place is now going to be opened up to you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Fire Spring,ï¿½ located southwest of here.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Listen to the melodies of all eight power spots.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you do not fail, you may upset Giygas' plans...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Understand, [PRINT_NAME NESS]?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The time will come.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The time when the destiny of you and the whole universe will overlap...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It is fast approaching.[HALT][RESTORE_MUSIC]
[SET_FLAG TEMP_2]
[END]
